name: Learn Spanish For Kids
description: Learn Spanish for Kids is an educational application for your kids to learn Spanish effectively. With this free app to learn Spanish for kids, kids can recognize Spanish Alphabet, animals, fruits, color, food, numbers.... Teach Spanish for Kids is important language for kids development. Learning while playing is the best fun and effectively way for your kids to learn Spanish easy.  So, Learn Spanish for Kids has 2 fun game. In game, kids can practice phonics Spanish, help kids remember vocabulary better. One word will be automatically pronounced, kids have to listen what is it, then choose true image by touching screen. Lets your kids learn and play now! Learn Spanish for Kids has 24 topics which are around kids real life, 694 words vocabulary with sound and images of them . You can use all of them without network, its free. * Spanish Alphabet: 26 Spanish letters of alphabet and kids can watch many ABC songs, Alphabet videos in Videos Spanish. Learning by image brings better results for learn Spanish for kids. * Numbers: Beside ABC alphabet, this learn Spanish for kids also provide about 1- 20 numbers of section that helps kids learn Spanish number conveniently. * Animals: includes 90 animals with real pictures of them. Your kids very love animals so it help kids impression and want to learn Spanish. * Transports: 24 pictures of vehicle in Spanish for kids, which all of kids are interested! * Color: 18 colors in Spanish for kids. * Country: 60 countries with Spanish name for kids. * Vegetables: 40 popular of vegetables around the world. All of us is Spanish name for kids.  * Fruits: The 51 Healthiest Fruits On Earth with real picture. Your kids very love it and you can find the way to get your kids to eat better. * Flower: includes top 22 flowers beautiful in the world. Your girls will very like them and help kids learn Spanish name of them.  * Food: have 40 Spanish words for many different types of delicious food. * Object: 40 common objects in real life. Kids will learn Spanish name object around their life. * Shape: 26 type of shapes in Spanish, the app helps to build the skills and knowledge of your kids in a playful manner. * Job: 50 Spanish name of Professions & Jobs will help kids know about your dream jobs in the feature. * Verb: Learn and study the most frequently used 50 Spanish vocabulary verbs used in speaking Spanish daily.  * Adjectives: Kids can learn 30 adjectives common in Spanish to describe physical appearance. * Nature: 18 pictures of nature will help your kids knowledge about nature. * Classroom: 24 popular objects in school. * Dates: includes 7 days of week, 12 months and 4 seasons in a year! * Christmas & Halloween: During festivals like Christmas, Halloween and New Year a lot of vocabulary related to celebrations can easily sink into kids.
